text: Shopify ek easy-to-use platform hai jahan aap jaldi se apna online store bana sakte hain.  Yeh beginners ke liye perfect hai aur bohat sari apps aur integrations offer karta hai.
WordPress zyada flexibility deta hai. Aap apni website ko customize kar sakte hain aur apne hisab se design kar sakte hain.  Lekin, yeh thoda technical ho sakta hai.
Bhaut sari aur bhi platforms hain jaise Wix, Squarespace, etc.  Har platform ke apne pros aur cons hain, isliye apni business ki zarurat ke hisab se choose karen.
Apni business ki size, technical skills, aur budget ko consider karen.  Agar aap beginner hain toh Shopify ek acha option hai. Agar aapko zyada control chahiye toh WordPress best hai.
